The movie tells the story of a taxi driver named刘刚(Chuanggong), who is trying to make ends meet in New York City. Without hesitation, Daryl jumps out of his taxi and charges toward the two thugs who are about to molest Mala. The two thugs, who are not very big and are wearing dirty clothes, try to run away from Daryl, but he catches them both in their attempt to run away from Daryl.
